description.narrative: (1. Climate change mitigation: Project will result to positive environmental effects by lowering GHG emissions. (2. Increasing clean energy production: IFC investment will increase the development of solar energy generation to meet the countrys renewable energy targets. (3. Creating employment opportunities: Project will generate direct and indirect employment opportunities in all activities related to the development of solar project.

Mahindra Renewables Private Limited (MRPL or the Company or the Solar Power Developer), a wholly owned subsidiary of Mahindra Susten Private Limited is developing, constructing, operating and maintaining a 250MWac solar power project at Bhiv ji ka gaon Village, in Baap Tehsil, Jodhpur District in the State of Rajasthan (the Project).

name.narrative: The proposed project development of 250 MW AC capacity solar PV projects at Village -Bhivji ka gaon, Tehsil Baap, District Jodhpur, in the state of Rajasthan. The Company has identified and will acquired land parcels aggregating 1200 acres for proposed development free from all encumbrances.
